nodes.text: Electric polearms were a melee weapon in the form of a polearm which saw use during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Electric polearms appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
